place.name: Berlin's Brandenburg Gate
place.desc: Modeled on the Acropolis in Athens and built for King Frederick William II in 1791, the monumental sandstone Brandenburg Gate in Berlin's Mitte district was the city's first Neoclassical structure

place.name: Cologne Cathedral
place.desc: located on the banks of the Rhine and is undoubtedly Cologne's most impressive landmark.
